column2: text
OvN Lost Factions
Lost Factions adds new and interesting races to the campaign map and are playable with Mixu's Unlocker (Which is a required mod).
Enable AI led Lost Factions
Enables individual options for all AI led lost factions or disables all AI led Lost Factions.
Enable or disable AI led factions individually
Amazons
Enables or disables AI led Amazons.
Araby
Enables or disables AI led Araby factions.
Blood Dragons
Enables or disables AI led Blood Dragons.
Citadel of Dusk
Enables or disables AI led Citadel of Dusk.
Halflings
Enables or disables AI led Halflings.
Trolls
Enables or disables AI led Trolls.
Harbinger of Doom (Fimir)
Enables or disables AI led Harbinger of Doom faction.
Albion
Enables or disables AI led Albion factions.
Servants of Fimulneid (Fimir)
Enables or disables AI led Servants of Fimulneid faction.
Grudgebringers
Enables or disables AI led Grudgebringers.
Dread King (Partially)
Enables or disables AI led Dread King faction. Will disable the Legendary Lord, but due to a technical limitation we cannot disable the whole faction.
Rotblood Tribe
Enables or disables AI led Rotblood Tribe.
